pages.text: $(marked)Ravens$() are dark birds that can be found in $(marked)plains$() and $(marked)forests$(). When killed, they will drop $(item)feathers$().

Ravens can be bound as familiars, enabling the witch to occasionally reflect curses.$(br)Raven familiars also double the duration of $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)curses$() cast by the witch, making them much more effective.
Ravens can be tamed with $(item)Gold or Silver Nuggets$(), and bred with $(item)Wheat Seeds$().
